author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٢٣) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ العَماءِ ﴾
أَدْعُوكَ إِلَى الْبَقَاءِ وَأَنْتَ تَبْتَغِي الْفَنَاءَ، بِمَ أَعْرَضْتَ عَمَّا نُحِبُّ وَأَقْبَلْتَ إِلَى مَا تُحِبُّ.
translation:
(23) O SON OF THE SUPREME!
To the eternal I call thee, yet thou dost seek that which perisheth. What hath made thee turn away from Our desire and seek thine own?
